title: Trump responds to Iran leader's threat of regional war if US attacks
shortDescription: Trump been ratcheting up threats against Iran over the past several weeks, urging a nuclear deal and increasing U.S military presence in the region.

title: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein island joke at Grammys
shortDescription: President Trump threatened to sue Grammys host Trevor Noah over a joke he made about Trump and Bill Clinton visiting Jeffrey Epstein's island.

title: Trump to renovate the Trump-Kennedy Center
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will close the Trump-Kennedy Center for renovations that will take two years.

title: Trump Kennedy Center will close for two years, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the center needs to close for two years for renovations, then will return with a "Grand Reopening."

title: Trump threatens Canada over trade deal with China
shortDescription: President Trump said the United States would respond in a significant way if Canada enacts the trade agreement that it negotiated with China.

title: Trump says Epstein files have cleared him
shortDescription: President Trump said the the latest batch of Justice Department files concerning convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein cleared him of any wrongdoing.

title: Speaker Mike Johnson says he's 'confident' shutdown will end by Tuesday
shortDescription: Despite his one-vote majority in the House and weather-related challenges, the GOP speaker said the partial shutdown won't last long.

title: Democrats win Texas Senate, US House seats to narrow GOP control
shortDescription: Democrat Taylor Rehmet won a special election, flipping a district that Trump had won by 17 percentage points in 2024.

title: Trump wants his DC arch to be largest in the world
shortDescription: “I’d like it to be the biggest one of all," Trump said Jan. 31. "We’re the biggest, most powerful, nation. I’d like it to be the biggest one.”

title: Can states ban begging? Supreme Court asked to decide in big 1st Amendment case
shortDescription: Is begging protected by the First Amendment? Alabama says it isn't. But courts have said governments can't completely ban panhandling.

title: Trump orders DHS to stay away from protests in Democratic-led cities
shortDescription: Trump said "under no circumstances" should Homeland Security get involved unless federal help is sought or federal property is threatened.

title: Americans losing faith in Trump fueled by GOP dip, poll shows
shortDescription: The president's dip in popularity is coming almost exclusively from discontent among Republicans, where there is a noticeable decline in support
